Method Detail

addRow

public static void addRow(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable table,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String lastCommit,
                          int badgesWeek,
                          int numBugs,
                          int numCommits,
                          int consecCommits,
                          java.lang.String newBadges,
                          java.lang.String[] badges)
This method adds a row to the table, if one exits it overwrites it. It's parameters are updated information

Parameters:
table - HTable to put to
email - Unique identifier for the row
lastCommit - Most recent commit
badgesWeek - Number of badges in the current week
numBugs - Number of total bugs
numCommits - Total number of bugs
consecCommits - Number of consecutive commits by day
newBadges - Newly acquired badges
badges - already acquired badges

public static java.lang.Object[] setup()

This method sets up the hbase configuration.

Returns:
Object array consisting of a HTable(1) and the config object(0)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getBadges

public static java.lang.Object[] getBadges(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result data)
Returns the acquired and new badges

Parameters:
data - The data from the hbase
Returns:
Object[0] is an ArrayList of acquired badges, Object[1] is newly acquired badges
